Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Chuck Schumer had an affair with a 16-year-old girl.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the accusation against Chuck Schumer by stating that he raped his daughter's 16-year-old friend.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a made-up story from a self-described satirical website.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the false accusation against Chuck Schumer is true and compares it to the allegations against Brett Kavanaugh.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the claim, which is that it originated as a parody and was later used as ammunition by right-wing social media accounts to defend Brett Kavanaugh.
